name: Real Arcade Bike
description:
Overview
Real Arcade Bike is an Arcade style bike game which is about reaching the goal without crashing and breaking the highscore with a new record time. Inspired by several arcade classics the game features a unique low poly art style.



Features
  • Custom physics engine designed for simple controlling scheme (no drift buttons) but still challenging gameplay.
  • Multiple bike classes with different behaviours.
  • Dynamic weather simulation with physics simulation influence.
  • Mutiple game modes
  • Multiplayer mode
  • Even if the game is designed as single player game about driving as fast as possible to the goal without crashing there are several multi player elements aware. In addition to competing with other players for the best time on the leaderboard you will also drive against the recorded ghost of your current leaderboard forerunner.

Multiple game modes
The game is designed on reaching the goal as fast as possible, but there are also other modes planned, currently i am working on an obstacle mode where you have to reach the goal without crashing into "living obstacles" which also might cross the road.
